channel.title: Website name to flash games/videos.. help plz
channel.description: I am making a website where you can watch flash videos and play flash games. I want to add my website name on the bottom right of each game/video. Whats the best program to do that with?

item.title: Website name to flash games/videos.. help plz
item.dc:creator: @Gtech_Warriors Gtech Warriors
item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

also i never said i was going to copy other people’s videos or games…

and no i wasnt talking about a vid player… but that actually sounds better than editing each video so ill just try finding someone who will code one for me or try learning how to make one… thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Website name to flash games/videos.. help plz
item.dc:creator: @Gtech_Warriors Gtech Warriors
item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

so if i have like 100 videos and games… i have to do that to each one separately… that would take 4 ever lol…

is there a way i can do like more than on at a time lol?

Read full topic

item.title: Website name to flash games/videos.. help plz
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Gtech Warriors:

I am making a website where you can watch flash videos and play flash games. I want to add my website name on the bottom right of each game/video. Whats the best program to do that with?

Well all I can think of is decompiling the flash with Sothink flash decompiler, then using Flash8 or FlashCS3 to add in your website.

Read full topic
